name: Stephen Curry
description: 6'2" point guard, greatest shooter ever. 4 championships, 2 MVPs. Changed the game with limitless range. Baby-faced assassin.

shimmy.name: Shimmy Celebration
shimmy.description: Signature shoulder shimmy after a deep three
shimmy.prompt: doing signature shoulder shimmy celebration - shoulders rolling, slight smile, taunting but playful, just hit a ridiculous three, having the time of his life

logo-three.name: Logo Three
logo-three.description: Pulling up from the logo - 35+ feet
logo-three.expression: casual confidence, this is normal for me
logo-three.prompt: shooting three-pointer from center court logo - casual release from 35+ feet, perfect form, face showing this is just another shot, redefining what's possible

night-night.name: Night Night
night-night.description: Sleep gesture - hands together under tilted head
night-night.expression: putting the game to bed, it's over
night-night.prompt: doing night-night sleep celebration - both hands together under tilted head like a pillow, eyes closed, putting the game and opponent to sleep, the dagger has landed

behind-back-dribble.name: Behind the Back
behind-back-dribble.prompt: executing behind-the-back dribble move - ball wrapping around back, defender stumbling or frozen, slight smirk, handles so tight they look like magic

release-point.name: Perfect Release
release-point.description: The quickest release in history - ball just leaving fingers
release-point.prompt: at apex of jump shot with ball just releasing - perfect form, incredibly quick release, ball spinning off fingertips, the shot that changed basketball, pure mechanical perfection

tunnel-warmup.name: Tunnel Shot
tunnel-warmup.prompt: shooting from arena tunnel before game - ball arcing toward distant basket, casual warmup from impossible distance, the showmanship before the show
